org.apps8os.motivator.ui
Class MoodHistoryActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      org.apps8os.motivator.ui.MoodHistoryActivity

public class MoodHistoryActivity
extends Activity

Represents the mood history of the user. In this activity, the functionality and layout changes based on the orientation. Portrait orientation has the mood history of the user by day.

Author:
Toni JÃ¤rvinen

setPageTitles

public void setPageTitles()
Load the page titles to an array. This done so the Title Pager Indicator does not have to construct them multiple times when changing pages.

loadLandscapeView

public void loadLandscapeView()
Loads the views and funtionality for landscape orientation.

loadPortraitView

public void loadPortraitView()
Loads the views and functionality for portrait orientation. In portrait view, days are represented in a horizontially scrollable carousel.
